resp = client.ml.put_data_frame_analytics(
    id="loan_classification",
    source={
        "index": "loan-applicants"
    },
    dest={
        "index": "loan-applicants-classified"
    },
    analysis={
        "classification": {
            "dependent_variable": "label",
            "training_percent": 75,
            "num_top_classes": 2
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
